title: Implement player ship entity
description: Create Player class with horizontal movement, shooting mechanics, health/lives system, and sprite rendering

title: Implement destructible shield barriers
description: Create Shield class with destructible segments, pixel-perfect or block-based damage system, positioned between player and enemies

title: Performance testing and optimization
description: Profile game performance, optimize rendering batch calls, test on different browsers/devices, ensure 60 FPS, reduce garbage collection

title: Setup Docker containerized development environment
description: Create Dockerfile and docker-compose.yml for isolated development environment with Node.js, web server, and all necessary tools

title: Implement particle effects and explosions
description: Create ParticleSystem for explosions when enemies/player destroyed, hit effects, and visual feedback with particle pooling

title: Implement bonus UFO enemy
description: Create UFO enemy that occasionally flies across the top of screen, awards bonus points when destroyed, with distinct sound effect

title: Implement sound effects system
description: Create AudioManager using Web Audio API for shoot, explosion, enemy movement, and game over sound effects with volume control

title: Implement sprite rendering system
description: Create Sprite class with position, size, texture coordinates, rotation, and color properties. Implement batch rendering for performance

title: Implement collision detection system
description: Create CollisionManager with AABB collision detection for bullets vs enemies, bullets vs player, bullets vs shields, enemies vs player, and enemies vs shields

title: Setup project structure and HTML/JS boilerplate
description: Create index.html, main game entry point, and project folder structure for assets, shaders, and game code

title: Implement wave and level progression system
description: Create WaveManager with increasing difficulty (speed, fire rate), wave transitions, enemy spawn patterns, and level completion detection

title: Implement keyboard input handling system
description: Create InputManager for keyboard events with key state tracking (pressed/released), support for arrow keys and spacebar, and event buffering

title: Implement score and lives tracking system
description: Create ScoreManager with score calculation, high score persistence (localStorage), lives tracking, and game over conditions

title: Implement bullet system for player and enemies
description: Create Bullet class with vertical movement, owner tracking, object pooling for performance, and cleanup of off-screen bullets

title: Add visual polish and screen effects
description: Implement screen shake on explosions, color flashing on damage, smooth transitions, and retro CRT shader effects

title: Add responsive design and touch controls
description: Make game responsive to different screen sizes, add touch/swipe controls for mobile devices, and on-screen buttons

title: Implement game state management system
description: Create GameStateManager with states (menu, playing, paused, game over), state transitions, and pause functionality

title: Implement texture loading and atlas system
description: Create texture loader with async image loading, WebGL texture creation, and sprite atlas support for efficient memory usage

title: Create game sprite assets and textures
description: Design and create pixel art sprites for player ship, 3 enemy types, bullets, shields, explosions, and compile into sprite atlas

title: Implement HUD and UI rendering
description: Create UI system for rendering score, lives, current wave, high score, menu screens, and game over screen with WebGL text rendering or canvas overlay

title: Implement enemy invader entities and formation system
description: Create Enemy class with different enemy types, coordinated formation movement (left-right with step-down), shooting behavior, and animation

title: Implement WebGL context initialization and rendering pipeline
description: Setup WebGL context, viewport, clear color, and basic render loop with requestAnimationFrame

title: Create shader programs for 2D sprite rendering
description: Implement vertex and fragment shaders for rendering textured quads with color tinting and alpha blending
